title: Hechter Studio font
content:
hello guys

and Happy New Year for you all.  
I would like to know what is that font used in this logo for “STUDIO” and “CREATEUR DE LINGERIE”.  
It seems to be a kind of “Futura” or “Avant Garde” (the “O” shape).  
Could you help me to find it ?

Thanks

Best regards

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hechter.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121184217/http:/typophile.com/files/hechter.jpg) | 19.8 KB |

 [‹ (x) Basic monospaced sans - Akkurat Mono {John McHugh}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121184217/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40889 "Go to previous forum topic") [Flower Fancy font?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121184217/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40972 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lepetitfakir

comments.content:
Is it Gill Sans?  
The R looks about right, but I can’t quite see the shape of G.

The C as well as the R _do_ look like Gill Sans.

Certainly isn’t Franklin Gothic nor Helvetica.

Oh crap Im sorry i read this wrong! I thought he was looking for Hechter!

Scrap everything I said! It is Gill Sans!

thank you guys !  
You’re great !  
A great site for inspiration (maybe you know it) : [http://www.ffffound.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121184217/http:/www.ffffound.com/)
